Copycat Wingstop Cajun Corn


Ingredients
4 ears corn
2 tablespoons olive oil
1 1/4 teaspoons kosher salt
1/2 cup butter
1/2 teaspoon pepper
1 teaspoon onion powder
1 teaspoon garlic powder
1/4 teaspoon thyme
1/4 teaspoon oregano
1 teaspoon paprika
1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper

Cooking Instructions

Cut corn into 2-inch thick pieces. Toss corn with olive oil,
1 teaspoon salt and 2 tablespoons melted butter. Preheat an
air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) according to
manufacturer's instructions. Add corn to air fryer and cook
about 15 minutes, tossing occasionally, until partially
golden brown. Meanwhile, combine remaining salt and butter
with remaining ingredients in a large bowl and mix well. Add
cooked corn to butter mixture and toss well to coat.
Source 

https://www.allrecipes.com/copycat-wingstop-cajun-corn-recipe-8681405
